subject: [ANN] Early access program for software build management server Parabuild 2.1
msgSnippet: Hello everyone, Viewtier Systems would like to invite members of JUnit group to join the early access program (EAP) for Parabuild 2.1. Parabuild is a software
messageBody:
Hello everyone,

Viewtier Systems would like to invite members of JUnit group to
join the early access program (EAP) for Parabuild 2.1. Parabuild
is a software build management server that provides continuous
integration builds and practically unbreakable daily builds.

Parabuild supports rendering JUnit XML log results and provides
online charts for test statistics. We are looking to extend JUnit
support and we will appreciate your feedback.

We offer free Parabuild licenses for every new bug found in
EAP builds of Parabuild.

Parabuild 2.1 home page:
http://www.viewtier.com/products/parabuild/eap.htm

We are looking forward to hearing from you.

Regards,

Slava Imeshev
vimeshev@...
